p: In addition to the detection of anti-ZIKV IgM antibodies by ELISA, anti-dengue IgM antibodies (Vircell, Granada, Spain) and anti-dengue IgG antibodies (Vircell) were determined according to manufacturer’s instructions. Human Anti-Zika Virus IgG ELISA Kit (R&D Systems, Inc. Minneapolis, MN, USA) was used to test samples for ZIKV-specific NS1-antigen-reactive IgG antibodies in the samples that exhibited anti-ZIKV IgM antibodies and neutralizing antibodies to ZIKV according to manufacturer’s instructions. OD values which were ≥ 2 times that of the negative control (N) were regarded as positive (P).
